website_summaries.verdict: Four silicone cupping cups of various sizes, made with FDA approved silicone.
pros: Can be used for both static and gliding cup massage
The cups are professional grade but excellent for home use and self massage
Cups are soft and easy to grip
They are applied simply with your hands
No pump or extra pieces required
cons: A few purchasers claimed the cups are too stiff to obtain good suction

customer_reviews.title: These Suck! haha ;D
customer_reviews.text: They work great! This brand was recommended by my PT. He said get the blue, because the clear may yellow out eventually. I think most of the reviews who say they don't stick, honestly, just aren't doing it right. There's no way for these things not to work if the conditions are correct. A little bit of oil or lotion may help, but don't use too much!! Fyi- If you leave it in one spot, it will leave a hickey, so keep it moving, or just do it for little bits at a time. Also, probably not good to use on thin, sensitive, old-person skin!
customer_reviews.author: Khaki Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Cellulite goodbye!
customer_reviews.text: Cellulite goodbye!!! This is my forever treatment. I'm 35 I work out three times a week, I weigh 115 but was struggling with cellulite even though my diet is on point. I found these and they truly helped with my cellulite. A++++
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’m a physical therapist, and I had some of these at my clinic. I liked them so much that I purchased some to use on myself at home. I would definitely recommend them to anyone who has the appropriate training to use them!
customer_reviews.author: RachelH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service
customer_reviews.text: Attempting scar-tissue reduction through home therapy. Like this product, am learning proper techniques on a trial and error basis. Home therapy added to several months of Physical Therapy has reduced my limitations by several degrees. Completely satisfied by this product
customer_reviews.author: LD & DLG

customer_reviews.title: To those who say its difficult to use it. ...
customer_reviews.text: To those who say its difficult to use it ... It's not rocket science !!! You squeeze, press and done !!honestly I received it today ,and it only took me a couple of minutes to figure it out .
customer_reviews.author: Tonia

customer_reviews.title: best described like hickies that will last on me around ...
customer_reviews.text: My order was received on time. I use it for cellulite massaging with coconut oil and it's noticeably working. It will leave a lot of bruising, best described like hickies that will last on me around 2 weeks. It does hurt at the beginning if you suck a lot of air out but you get used to it. I also use it on my husbands back for muscle and joint pain and he loves it and feels so relaxed till he falls asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs

customer_reviews.title: Hard for me to use
customer_reviews.text: I found this difficult to use. I hoped it would work for me but I couldn't squeeze it enough to get any suction. It made my thumb hurt trying. I saw a video of a woman that used it with success, however, her husband helped her put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Helene

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Good product, I need someone else to squeeze them and place them, they are a harder rubber and I have arthritis. Work great once on.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Day 1 this product was magic. Two weeks later, all the cups lost ability to suction. My brother bought another set to test, and he had the same problem. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warning makes cellulite worse
customer_reviews.text: Complete B.S God I was hoping this would have worked on the small amount of cellulite I had on the back of my legs . Made cellulite much worse !!!!!!Don’t believe the hype ladies . These companies should be ashamed of themselves making money and giving hope to women that are embarrassed of their cellulite. You don’t have to be overweight to have cellulite My BMI is 14 % and I have it . I also workout 6 days a week . I was so frustrated that I was getting some cellulite Very nieve to think this would work ... WHAT WAS I THINKING!!!!!!!🤬 Wish I could get my money back and compensation for all my heart ache .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Using for cellulite!
customer_reviews.text: I have deep cellulite areas in my legs after losing a large amount of weight. I've been using these for the past few weeks to help with the cellulite while I wait to afford plastic surgery. These have been making a noticeable difference in my cellulite to the point where some areas may not even need surgery with continued use and more strength training. I also do a coffee scrub/wrap in between my cupping days. I strongly encourage anyone struggling with cellulite to give these a try!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Lele

customer_reviews.title: Cupping? It’s awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I had heard of the traditional form of cupping (glass cups) but had never heard of this cupping method. I was introduced to cupping at physical therapy. I was unhappy with the range of motion in my left ankle which I had broken in January. After some intense cupping therapy I was able to walk without limping for the first time since my injury. I immediately purchased these cups (same as the ones at the pt office) and I’m so glad that I did. It takes some practice but once you get the hang of it you can use them on any sore muscles or soft tissue that is bothering you.
customer_reviews.author: AniRocZim

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: two years ago this product was amazing! they changed the plastic to a low quality cheap flimsy plastic. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Britney W

customer_reviews.title: Good Product - Blue Cups Provide Moderate Suction
customer_reviews.text: I just got this product and have used it the past two days and am very pleased so far. The cups are easy to use, feel good on muscles when using, provide good pain relief, and provide moderate suction. I sometimes wish they provided more suction, and I have heard that the green and white version of these cups have more suction than the blue cups I got, so that it something to consider before buying. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: Originally wanted to help w cellulite but so far I have only used for that twice. I use them on frequent pinched nerves and hubs lines them down my back regularly. I have chronic back pain and these really help relieve some of the pain. I’m a fan! Would recommend and maybe buy as a gift. Kind of want a second set for myself haha
customer_reviews.author: JRSorochty

customer_reviews.title: Helps with knee pain!
customer_reviews.text: I have been doing cupping therapy on my knees and it has been working wonders! I was recommended this product by the message therapists that work in the chiropractic office that I'm employed at and I'm so grateful for it! This was a game changer for me and I'm able to function normal and honestly have a better quality of life now!
customer_reviews.author: Trista

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding massage therapy tool; but, 1 cup was defective and split at seam.
customer_reviews.text: The second largest cup split at the seam. Otherwise, this is an outstanding therapy. I HAD tight tendons at the back of my calves and outer thighs. Within a 3 day time frame, after a daily session, my tendons are relaxed and feel soft and flexible. It would be nice if I could get a replacement for the defective cup, without having to return the entire set. UPDATE: I RECEIVED A REPLACEMENT OVERNIGHT! I was stunned and very happy. The improvement in my tendonitis is immeasurable. Start off with an arnica oil and take the time massaging both legs, from every angle. Since these are rehab tools, it’s good to know I never have to worry about access to them.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Twiss

customer_reviews.title: These are so awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a LMT and these are little jewels. Once you learn to suction them on you won’t want anything else. You just add a little oil or lotion to your client and then put these little bad boys on. I use them lots and my patients/ clients love it. ( I work along side a DR. in a chiropractic office) don’t leave them in the same place for too long. Leave in the same spot for about 2-3 minutes. You don’t have to un-suction them to move them.
customer_reviews.author: Eagles Fan

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction strange shape
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. These do not suction well. The shape makes it very difficult to hold in your palm and to get suction. Also the lip of it is very small making the cup slip off very easily. I own the dome shaped cups and really like them. Easy to hold and the suction is great. The ones I own are for my face. I wanted these for cellulite on my thighs and needed a bigger cup. They don’t help with cellulite at all. Don’t be fooled like I was.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great as a product.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful as a product. Have been using it on myself weekly since it arrived. Very worth the purchase. It's a massage tool so it's not going to fix what's wrong with you, just help manage is all. Range of motion (ROM) / Pain relief 3 stars - cupping helps but is only a massage tool (mentioning again so people don't get their hopes up when using massage tools) Suction power 5 stars - you're supposed to apply oil to the area first when cupping (olive oil, coconut, grapeseed, et cetera) I'd recommend also using an essential oil like peppermint when using it on an area like the arm leg or neck.
customer_reviews.author: alex resa

customer_reviews.title: Great for a newbie
customer_reviews.text: I am a Licensed Massage Therapist but fairly new to cupping. I have tried several versions of the silicone cups and really am enjoying these from LURE essentials. Very good suction and ability to use in a gliding application. Haven't had any dramatic results, but I am still using them cautiously and perhaps minimally. I do like that they help to save my hands and my clients like the negative pressure that they deliver.
customer_reviews.author: kamoon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using massage therapy for over 25 years now due to an injury. My massage therapist I have currently, due to moving to another state just recently used cup therapy on me. What an amazing thing cup therapy is!!!! I purchased these to use in between visits with her and they are just amazing. Hopefully now I can do my stretching and movements easier without pain since this cup therapy is working on loosening my fascia from my muscles. All the stretching in the world was causing me more pain because I needed fascial release and the cup therapy is now, after all of these years, providing this release!
customer_reviews.author: Donna J.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: These are not bad for what they are but not exactly professional grade. I have had many professional cupping treatments, and these seem to fail to create the same level of suction to get the best results. Because the silicone is thick and more firm, I get less compression on the cups creating less suction.
customer_reviews.author: Yarrow10

customer_reviews.title: I 100% recommend this to everyone
customer_reviews.text: I just received my cups a couple days ago. Last night I used them on my thighs because I wanted to get an idea for how they work and feel. These things are incredible! I hold *a lot* of tension in my legs and last night I was able to give myself one of the highest quality massages I've ever received, all while sitting up in my bed watching The Matrix :) My knees aren't popping from the tension as much as the used to and the effect is very noticeable. The movement of blood throughout my legs is a mood lifter. I 100% recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Mooneyham

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Came very quickly! Very pleased with product quality. Was what my sons physical therapist was using on his calves during their sessions. Bought them for us to use at home."
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over a Decade of Issues Gone Within A Few Days
customer_reviews.text: I am a U.S. Army veteran that was medically discharged due to chronic, bilateral "shin splints." After my discharge I continued to suffer from cramping, foot drop, paresthesia, burning, numbness and pain in both calves. I speculated for years that I was suffering from chronic exertional compartment syndrome, but never received a proper diagnosis and was even refused further visits by a VA medical center. After 14 years of struggle, I have finally experienced relief by using this product in conjunct with a percussion gun. It feels like a vice was removed from both calves and I am able to walk freely again without the crippling symptoms.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Dungan

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this if you have deep pain.
customer_reviews.text: I had constant pain in my neck all the time! I have tried everything and this has worked the best. The suction pulls out the area of my neck where the pain is most prevalent. I no longer have that pain in my neck. Just have some tension every now and then. I highly recommend this if you have deep pain.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky D.

customer_reviews.title: The edges are sharp and not rounded. Causes pain when performing dynamic cupping.
customer_reviews.text: The edges are sharp and not rounded. It appears to be a manufacturing defect as my older cups from Lure have rounded edges and are smooth. These new cups cause pain when used for dynamic cupping or any technique that requires movement of the cups on the skin. Would have sent them back for replacement but I didn't open the package and use them until too late.
customer_reviews.author: DonW

customer_reviews.title: You Will Be Happy You Have These
customer_reviews.text: Durable, powerful, flexible high quality silicon material. The suction force is strong, but you can adjust it easily. These cups have effectively released pain, pressure, & soreness from my body using deep tissue massage. These are beneficial in drawing out inflammation and relieving discomfort quickly. If you are on the fence...just do it you will not be sorry you did 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Shann 🎀 Shann

customer_reviews.title: The suction is good, but no pain relief
customer_reviews.text: They do stick as long as you don’t have hair in the area. If you leave them on for a while it does draw the blood up, like a hickey. I don’t see how it relieves pain at all. It feels like a massage but you get tired of moving them around. I’ll just take some ibuprofen.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon T

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality in a small package. It works according to the instructions for relief of body pain. . I tried to use it on my feet to relieve plantar fasciitis pain but it didn't stay on since the contour of my foot does not allow a good seal. Its not advertised for plantar fasciitis relief. I like how the cups fit into each other.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skeptic to Raving Fan in 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I was a skeptic and by the time they arrived, I was having buyers remorse. Then, I decided I may as well try them. I was Having significant hip/gluteal pain. It was deep and I was over it! I grabbed some coconut oil and the largest cup. It hurt like crazy- and then.... it was gone! Like the knot that was in my muscle had dissipated. It takes using them a few times to get the pesky muscle to behave over the longer term but I AM a HUGE fan!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Frommel

customer_reviews.title: So many uses.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I was introduced to cupping therapy by my buddy who is a huge Lure fan! These silicone cups are super easy to glide for active recovery and they stick very nicely to my muscles. I've used them to relieve lactic acid after training and to warm up before workouts. My wife snuck out the large size and keeps it in the shower for cellulite massage. Time to get wifey her own set too.
customer_reviews.author: TE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for cellulite
customer_reviews.text: Love the suction! Make sure to use body oil for easy motion. Works wonders for cellulite. Painful but really works. Do it every day like ten minutes per area and you will see results in 2 weeks. First week you will have bruises. I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Customer C G

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Would recommend to any who is having trouble with sports injuries.
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended to me by a friend who is a physical trainer. Used properly they are fantastic. Definitely help with rejuvenating sore muscles. Use them several times a week. Easy to clean. Easy to store. Read and follow all directions. You can really hurt yourself if you use them improperly.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Reduced my cellulite only in 5 sessions! I can't wait to see my results after 10 sessions!
customer_reviews.author: lorealp

customer_reviews.title: They have a good grip to them and really get the blood circulating ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only used them 3-4 times so far, but I am liking them a lot. They have a good grip to them and really get the blood circulating in the areas you use them on. I got them for smoothing out and firming up my legs and buttocks. I'll have to post an updated review after I've used them longer. So far I am loving them though!!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Easy for new users and seasoned users
customer_reviews.text: These work great. They suck a lot but you can adjust so that there’s not quite as much suction as with the glass sets or sets with the pump so they’re great for deep tissue massage and also for people new to cupping who might be a little afraid. Easy to clean and anyone can learn how to use these. I like them so much that I’m going to get a second set!
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: ... i read how to use for cellulite it was easy..
customer_reviews.text: Once i read how to use for cellulite it was easy ...need loads of coconut oil and you wont get black marks and use the bigger cup on legs etc
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Releive muscle pain!
customer_reviews.text: I have constant neck and back pain stemming from muscles in the front chest and shoulder. I use oil and the suction cups to bring blood to the muscle and really get relief. I've only used two of the entire pack as of yet and have had these for over 6 months. If you know what you are doing with this item you can really cut back on messages and take care of yourself. I do this in bed at night while watching tv. It's that simple. But, please, make sure you know what you are doing!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Work very well for scar tissue.
customer_reviews.text: These cups work very well for removing scar tissue after surgery. My military doctors used these on me post knee surgery and recommended I purchase them when I moved to continue therapy. Well worth the money. I saw immediate results after every session. My scar area is almost completely flat now.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Meh I would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: They work but they are not smooth enough for cup gliding as the clear silicone ones kinda disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Barros

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I’m used to getting acupuncture and cupping weekly for back problems. While these Cups are not as powerful as those used by my doctor, they are a nice at home substitute that helps provide some relief.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made. They seemed a bit stiff on my first use, but they became more pliable after a few minutes of use. They are very easy to use and clean. I like how you can customize the intensity of the treatment.
customer_reviews.author: camalaki

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely hard plastic. You only really use two out of the four sizes. Too bad they didn’t offer more in the package as if you them stationary, you need more than one. I bought the ones that you attach a pump to it and they’re so much better than these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cellulite gone
customer_reviews.text: The best thing ever!!! Cellulite gone! And scar tissue is smoothing out!!!! Sucks!!! Hurts only if u take too much skin in so do little suck in the skin. You’ll understand when u try lol. But the best thing. Skin is smoother!
customer_reviews.author: Bibi

customer_reviews.title: Advanced Cupping Therapy Sets - Edge Flex Silicone Vacuum Suction Cupping Cups
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our clinic over a year ago. Still used several times per week. Easy to keep clean. One of the better sets we have purchased...very little signs of wear. Great price. Will purchase again ( if and when these ever wear out).
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mark E. Kalarovich

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! So easy my fiancé can do it ..
customer_reviews.text: I am a physical therapist assistant and I’ve seen these used a lot in the clinic, but I bought these to use at home because my traps are crazy tight all time and massages don’t even seem to help. I started using these between my massage therapy sessions and I’m feeling MUCH better. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product For a Novice User
customer_reviews.text: I had been learning how to do "cupping therapy" from a friend who is Physical Therapist at my gym and saw amazing results. I decided to commit and get my own pair (without a pump) and found that it was easier to use and less intimidating. The cups are very sturdy and easy to use. I was so excited from the first set that i went ahead and got another. So far i have no complaints and am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Torres

customer_reviews.title: A MUST!
customer_reviews.text: With the shut down, can't get a message. Thought I try these. Very happy I did, no regrets. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made with body safe materials
customer_reviews.text: My massage therapist recommended these cups and I am happy to say they work as advertised. Easy to use even for a beginner that’s never used cupping therapy before! No harsh plastic smells when you open the packaging. The best part is they are made with safe, bpa free plastics.
customer_reviews.author: Review Queen

customer_reviews.title: it came highly recommended however, I find that the smaller cups do ...
customer_reviews.text: This set is ok, it came highly recommended however, I find that the smaller cups do not stay on. The larger cups work very well, I am a bit disappointed that I am not able to use all of them.
customer_reviews.author: kimmie

customer_reviews.title: Great suction, light, perfect thickness m... it works ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many cupping sets . These remain to be the best . Enough thickness for good suction . Not too heavy, the smallest size cup is perfect for the face, IV you suffer from tmj/tmd, jaw pain, headaches, sinus issues, nerve problems... etc. I highly reccomend, I have even given these as gifts . Whatever, they work well .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cupping
customer_reviews.text: This really helps if you want to finish with cellulite, I use it almost every day after showering along with the dry brushing and to get easier to use I put new York massage oil that I got here too and its giving me amazing results. You have to be consistent in order to get results. But trust MW its worthed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Good for pain relief but not so much for cellulite
customer_reviews.text: I have been cupping for cellulite and wanted to order something with more sizes. These cups are very durable however after a couple weeks I feel they are better for stationary cupping to relieve pain rather than cellulite. Just my personal opinion!!!
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Hopeful

customer_reviews.title: Got it for cellulite
customer_reviews.text: I made this purchase because I wanted to get rid of the cellulite on my legs. The jury still out...I've only had it for a week. Stay posted
customer_reviews.author: Nicky H

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I use these to get rid of unwanted cellulilte, and they really work! A friend recommended them, so I gave it a try. No matter how thin I got, or how hard I exercised, I still had this area of cellulite on my stomach. I use it almost every day in the shower for a few minutes, and within a couple of months, the cellulite was 90% gone! Amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a must for sore/tight muscles
customer_reviews.text: My physical therapist uses a cupping set on me and I love it. Decided to get my own set for home use. Definitely helps to increase blood flow to recover quicker from overworked muscles. Also used it on my cousin a couple times around her knee. Surprisingly, it stopped all the clicking her knee makes when she engages in full range of motion movements. It does need to be done daily or multiple times a week to be truly effective. Overall, I would recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Nylah Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have, but not necessary
customer_reviews.text: These are fine, but I just don’t end up using them as much as I thought I would. I use fascia blasters somewhat regularly and I thought these would complement nicely, but I don’t see a huge benefit. The variety of sizes are nice, and they’re very thick and durable. I clean mine in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only wish I'd found sooner!
customer_reviews.text: These cups have changed my skin! All areas I've used them on are tighter and had less visible cellulite after the second treatment. It is uncomfortable at first, but means the fascia is being restored! I cannot say enough good things about how this product, and how it's helped me- all natural too!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Freeman

customer_reviews.title: I love these and they feel great!!
customer_reviews.text: I have occasional sciatica pain. If I use these on my lower back, it relieves the pain! I’ve watched YouTube videos suggesting these help leg fat, I’m not sure if it they do. I keep trying it with hope! The suction can be very strong but I have learned how to hold and apply suction cup just right!
customer_reviews.author: MARVA

customer_reviews.title: Works really Well!
customer_reviews.text: I so far really like these!!! You kinda have to play around with them to get a strong suction but I feel better after and get better range of montion in my neck and shoulders!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Rosales

customer_reviews.title: These cups ate the best !
customer_reviews.text: I love these cups they are soft and easy to use and clean . There are so many ways you can use massage cupping and this set has four different sizes that will work on any body part even feet! Ive used Kur cups for years amd several of my clients have ordered them for home use . I always reccomenmd rhey choose this set.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Ledger

customer_reviews.title: It is fantastic for improving blood circulation and I believe that when ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of cupping. It is fantastic for improving blood circulation and I believe that when your circulation is at it's best your body as a whole works more effectively and efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great for Self Cupping
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for self-cupping. I was a complete beginner, but the way these cups were designed made them easy to use. They relieved a lot of my back pain and the results (color after cupping) showed me how well my blood was circulating and where I had the most tension at. I would recommend watching a video before using, though, like to know that cupping over lymph nodes is not good for you. Would definitely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Gio

customer_reviews.title: As described! Works great.
customer_reviews.text: These cups work pretty much just like the ones our massage therapist would use. They really give a 'deep' massage and help to alleviate muscle tension. So glad I finally bought them!
customer_reviews.author: belle1430

customer_reviews.title: Great for circulation
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the cups to help with circulation in my legs. I will admit that the cups are painful to use. I tried using coconut oil with the cups but I found using conditioner in the shower is way better and it’s not as painful.
customer_reviews.author: Sweets123

customer_reviews.title: No suction
customer_reviews.text: The suction cups will not adhere. Lousy product. Try another brand, my sister has suction cups from another manufacturer and they seem to work.
customer_reviews.author: Cathryn D. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but keeps falling off. If the cups are not falling off then they are stuck on me. Quite possible that I’m still learning how it use them. The quality is very good though.
customer_reviews.author: Yana

customer_reviews.title: Good Cups But I like the Clear
customer_reviews.text: Great cups but the clear is a bit more firm. I used cupping in massage therapy and they are great tools. Lure has many great products and if something does not work out for you just contact them and they will help you. Great company.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny S.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Good from what I can see but haven’t used them very much since I’ve feeling not so well and haven’t really had a chance to use them.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: I would buy this product again. I think it would be nicer to have two large cups instead of that tiny one. Other than that all if it as it promotes.
customer_reviews.author: Sallyd

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for people with stomach issues and tight leg muscles
customer_reviews.text: I have really tight muscles and this helps a lot. Highly recommend for people with stomach issues and tight leg muscles. Very Affordable. I do think after a couple months the cups are not as strong but still works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't think they would really work!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how well these work. I have such a bad knee that I was willing to try anything. Once you get how they are to be used, they work great. I use one of the medium ones on my knee for about 30 minutes and I get a lot of relief.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I've bought in forever!
customer_reviews.text: I was at a point of being nearly unable to walk, I was in so much pain from plantar faciitis. These cups worked a miracle for me. I was able to walk almost immediately and back to exercising with full effort within days. I had previously tried many different devices and supports with varying degrees of success, but nothing compares to how much cupping helped.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: A++ I will be back!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Arrived on time and as described plus a super informational e-book. I will be back for the facial cups soon. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: didn’t see improvement of cellulite on rear & back of thighs. not sure if I used correctly
customer_reviews.text: Got this for cellulite on my rear and back of thighs but didn’t see any effects and not sure if I even used them correctly. Wasted money
customer_reviews.author: Talia Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Over-all I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: Over-all I really like this product. The only downfall is the edges can be a little sharp if you are trying to drag it across a muscle.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Westover

customer_reviews.title: Great cups!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this set. I’ve been using the cups for a couple of months now, and the quality is really great!
customer_reviews.author: Sona

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use Great results
customer_reviews.text: I love these suction cups. They are super easy to use. The different sizes help to work on various parts of the body and tissue. So easy to adjust the amount of suction. Most definitely use a good massage oil when using it makes them glide much better on the skin. Greatly helps with blood flow, reducing scar tissue and general muscle release.
customer_reviews.author: pabel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These work great! they have good suction and love the various sizes. It has really helped loosen my muscle in my leg. Nice quality and easy to clean as well
customer_reviews.author: Kris Y

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Been using for two weeks and already see a big difference! I mostly use the biggest and second biggest ones for those problem areas. Takes a little practice and a lot of coconut oil, but overall great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Suction
customer_reviews.text: Initially the suction was great, then after about 4 weeks of using it every other day, the cups suction diminished and they would not stay on the skin as long. I think my next purchase I will try a suction device with a pump.
customer_reviews.author: Haber

customer_reviews.title: Get the cup outta here cellulite
customer_reviews.text: AMAZED at how just after 1 use it broke up my cellulite. I had skinny fat deposits. I am an Esthetician & am going to use on my clients as well !
customer_reviews.author: elaina rankin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Well made not cheaply it made
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Well made not cheaply it made. Definitely read instructions before using. Keeping in one place causes bruising . When using, make sure you keep it moving. I will do an,update later on skin results
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Very soft on skin!!
customer_reviews.text: These were made well. I don’t haven’t used them long enough to know what they do for me but I will post when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Giyler

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome for cupping, I have some of their other cups & love those as well. It was awesome they allowed me to sample this new product!<3
customer_reviews.author: LMTIvyK

customer_reviews.title: Therapy Cupping
customer_reviews.text: Nice customer service. Several informative emails & video directions. Cups easy to use. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carole A. Zoellner

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had any issues with these. They are helpful for my back pain. They work quite well and allow me to do cupping to myself.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Cupping Therapy
customer_reviews.text: Stimulates my skin while massages and detoxification moving the facia under the dermis.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I use Rock Pods at work and wanted something for home, but didn’t want to spend the money on Rock Pods. These are cheap and work poorly in comparison to Rock Pods. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to self apply
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are easy to self apply even to my neck and back. When using on my daughter they are very easy for my hands which have arthritis. I lost one cup that we use the most, I wish I could purchase sizes separately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: Work good make sure you have good lotion or lubes to move. sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Kenah

customer_reviews.title: Bomb suction
customer_reviews.text: These are bomb plan to buy some more did it on my t band and glutes cuz I have a dimple that want to get rid off I will be trying these on my parents this weekend hope it helps for the lower back they always have and arthritis pain
customer_reviews.author: Jmsfitt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use - held suction AND can be used with cream for dynamic cupping. 4 different sizes so you can use on small and/or very large areas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as well as the salon solutions.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Just like the salons and the effects are immediate. Make sure you are in a position where you can relax and get the full advantage of increased blood flow to tired and sore muscles. You will of course get localized bruising. That's because the blood is being drawn to the area also the surface.
customer_reviews.author: R. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: I've never used any of these before so nothing to compare them to but I do know that these do exactly what they say and they do it very well. They have excellent suction! I've actually bruised myself using these but that's my fault not the cup.
customer_reviews.author: Selina6

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: If you want A lot of suction these aren’t for you as the suction isn’t super strong . Get the hand pump cupping set if you want extreme suction if not these are good for everyday use
customer_reviews.author: lindsay bohney

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended from my physical therapist. They are great quality. Easy to use and the multiple sizes work great for different muscle groups. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: toddlermommy

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have used them 4-5 times per week and they have not helped "tone" my legs as the cellulite looks the same. I exercise daily and thought these cups would help get rid of the tiny bit of cellulite that has accumulated over the years, and that has not been the case. I will give it a little more time to see if this method somehow follows through.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Advanced Cupping Therapy Sets - Edge Flex Silicone Vacuum Suction Cupping Cups for Muscle and Joint Pain Cellulite & More (Brilliant Blue, 4)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlueATTENTION!!! Be sure to watch EDGE cupping cup application video tutorial that shows how to easily create LIGHT, MEDIUM and STRONG suction. The key to proper suction is in the TECHNIQUE! 


ANCIENT WISDOM - MODERN CUPPING 

The Lure Difference 

True health starts with self-care. Cupping transformed our family’s lives and we are excited for you to try and discover what it can do for yours. 

Beauty goals? Pain Relief? Stress? There is a cup for that! 
Lure Essentials is a true industry leader and innovator with first to market easy to use DIY cupping therapy sets for self-care application. With our beauty-focused GLAM and GLAM Pro cupping kits you can transform the look and health of your skin in under 5 minutes a day, where the SCULPT cupping set is your best-kept body perfecting solution for cellulite and fat loss. Try the ENERGY cupping set for those pesky trigger points, joints and foot aches, or level up your cupping massage with our massage therapists’ favorite EDGE cupping sets in the signature Blue, Emerald and Crystal Clear colors; support your gut health with ZEN cups and whether you are a pro athlete or a weekend warrior, enjoy better mobility, stay at the top of athletic performance, and prevent injuries with the ADVANTAGE, EDGE and ENERGY cups. 
The various cupping kits we developed help you explore natural pain relief options, relax overworked muscles, support healthy aging and more. 
We hope you join the #GetCupped movement and see what's possible! Happy Cupping!
feature_bullets: WE KNOW WE ARE NOT THE CHEAPEST: But there is a reason for that. EDGE Cupping Therapy Cups are STRONGER & last LONGER - made with THE highest quality transparent platinum cured medical grade silicone. Unlike other inexpensive cups on the market, Lure cups are DURABLE & ELASTIC. We never add plastics, fillers, BPA, BPS, phthalates, PVC, latex or other fillers. We care about what goes on your skin and your results. Which cupping set that’s right for you? See Video Shorts or LureEssentials store

BETTER THAN DEEP TISSUE MASSAGE – RESULTS LIKE NO OTHER: Our EDGE cups for cupping work for cosmetic use, health and pain management. 5 Minutes of CUPPING = 30 Min of Deep Tissue Massage. Cupping is more effective for fascia adhesions or trigger point release than classic massage, foam or muscle massage roller, fascia and cellulite blaster. Remarkably effective for skin firming and toning, inch loss, stretch marks and cellulite. Enjoy in the shower or with BOOST Cellulite Massage Cupping Oil.

WHO CAN BENEFIT FROM CUPPING THERAPY: Being first to market with proprietary DIY cupping system for personal self-care and professional use, Lure cupping kits with massage vacuum cups are easy to use regardless of experience. The cups are pliable so the intensity of suction is controllable. Remember to download our complimentary Cupping Book sent after your order for benefits and best practices.

PROFESSIONAL ATHLETE or a WEEKEND WARRIOR? Cupping is a GAME CHANGER! Cupping Therapy has been known to improve athletic performance, recovery and mobility, relieve joint and muscle pain, spasms and so much more. TRAIN CONFIDENTLY – recover like a Champion! Choose from Transparent Clear, our iconic Brilliant Blue or Emerald Green colors.

FIRST CLASS PRODUCTS, SUPPORT and HAPPINESS GUARANTEE: YOU are # 1 and deserve the BEST! We stand behind every product, offer the best customer support and a lifetime product replacement warranty. Your happiness is the MOST important thing to us! If for any reason you are not happy, have questions about the product, our experts are standing by to help! With Lure, you shouldn't feel even the slightest bit of inconvenience, so please reach out to us right away. Happy Cupping!
